pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, December 14, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 12:00 p.m.

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Nunavut, P.J. Akeeagok.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Economic and Fiscal Update 2021 speech, to be delivered virtually by Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland in the House of Commons.

The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers to discuss our ongoing collaboration to address the COVID-19 Omicron variant of concern.

Media appearance

8:05 a.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air on RED FM Toronto.

The interview will also air on RED FM Calgary at 8:40 a.m. MT and on RED FM Vancouver at 10:10 a.m. PT.
